body_html:
Fixed by 8a72421

Thank you for the suggestion, @cancan101

Docker image size reduction is already reflected in the tensroflow/tensorflow:nightly* tags on Docker Hub, and will be reflected in tensorflow/tensorflow:latest* tags on next release.
body_text:
Fixed by 8a72421
Thank you for the suggestion, @cancan101
Docker image size reduction is already reflected in the tensroflow/tensorflow:nightly* tags on Docker Hub, and will be reflected in tensorflow/tensorflow:latest* tags on next release.
body:
Fixed by https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/8a724211a9d4871338afe874276abf1d358f799b

Thank you for the suggestion, @cancan101 

Docker image size reduction is already reflected in the tensroflow/tensorflow:nightly\* tags on Docker Hub, and will be reflected in tensorflow/tensorflow:latest\* tags on next release.
